entry.title: Russia Weighs Fate of Ukrainian Defenders in Mariupol
entry.content: Hundreds more Ukrainian soldiers evacuated from Mariupol’s Azovstal steel plant were taken as prisoners to Russian-held areas of Ukraine, Moscow said, as Russian prosecutors called for the regiment that was holed up there to be declared a terrorist organization.

entry.title: China Eastern Black Box Points to Intentional Nosedive
entry.content: Flight data suggests that someone in the cockpit of the Boeing 737-800 that crashed in March put the aircraft into a near-vertical descent, according to a preliminary U.S. assessment.

entry.title: How Germany Is Racing to Sever Dependence on Russian Energy
entry.content: Europe’s largest economy is scrambling to find new suppliers and invest billions in infrastructure to reverse decades of policy in weeks; business leaders warn of a financial crisis from higher energy prices.
